𓆥

𒀭 John, the prophet

𒀭♃ 𒀭𒂗𒆤 Jupiter 𐌉𐌖𐌐𐌀𐌕𐌄𐌓 𒀭♃ 𒀭𒂗𒆤 ⋍ ᵈ𒉺𒋼𒋛 ᵈPatesi ≈ deopater Δὶς πατήρ 𒀭♃ 𒀭𒂗𒆤 ᵈen-lil₂ 𒀭♃ 𒀭𒀫𒌓 AMAR-UTU AMAR-DAG Marduk

𜐧 𜐢 𜐟 φi φa phaín "shine"

𓃀 𓈖 𓅣 Phoenike 𜎯𜐪𜏌𜏵 Pinikir ≈ Νίκη Níkē "Jupiter" 𓅃 𓇋 𓏏 𓏌 𓅱 𓏜 Φᾰέθων Phaéthōn White Star (Jupiter) 𒉿𒋢 wa-su weiss 𒌓 BABBAR bright

kur 𒉽 𑀓 𓊖 𓐍 𐊨 𐘾 𐀏 𐘿 𐀤 𑁣 𓏴 𜐢 crown

𜎯𜐪𜏌𜏵 Pinikir "Venus" Phoenikeʳ = ᵛInanna
𒀭𒂗𒆤 "Jupiter" EnKer secondary reading 𒆤 KE₄ < Kur ကြာသပတေး krasa.pa.te Jupiter قاراقۇش qaraqush Jupiter ગુરુ guru Jupiter குரு kuru

𓋴 𓃀 𓇼 𓏤 Star component:

Sabguʳ Mercury 𓋴 𓃀 𓎼 𓅱 #sbg.w Shabtáy •Šabturn Saturn Ṣalbatānu Mars বৃহস্পতি brihospoti "Jupiter" اَلْمُشْتَرِي al-muštarī "Jupiter" secondary etymology Bad-Linguistics

𒀭 John the prophet's followers are called Sabian 𓋴 𓃀 𓇼 𓏤

𒀭 Aštar and Ištar venerated morning and evening star 𒀉𒌋𒆤
